verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* corpse \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* man \w slain|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* murder,

Thy ancients \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* place \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* body lieth \w the|strong="H0834"\w* distance \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1241"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* perceive \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* nearer \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drawn|strong="H4900"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* ploughed \w the|strong="H0834"\w* ground,

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H3381"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* rough \w and|strong="H8033"\w* stony \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* ploughed, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*: \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* strike \w off|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* head \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, whom \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H6310"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* matter \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* decided, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* clean \w or|strong="H1121"\w* unclean \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* judged.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w person|strong="H3027"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w killed|strong="H2491"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Our|strong="H7200"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H0408"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H5414"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w guilt|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w taken|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w free|strong="H5355"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* innocentâ€™s \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w shed|strong="H1818"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath commanded thee.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w lead|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H7617"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* seest \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* number \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w captives|strong="H7633"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* lovest \w her|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* wilt \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*,

Thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* she \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w hair|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* pare \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w nails|strong="H6856"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w put|strong="H5493"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* raiment, wherein \w she|strong="H0517"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w mourn|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* \w month|strong="H3391"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* unto \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shalt sleep \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H0517"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

Rut \w if|strong="H0518"\w* afterwards \w she|strong="H0834"\w* please thee \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, thou shalt \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H7971"\w*, \w but|strong="H0518"\w* thou mayst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6031"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w because|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast humbled \w her|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w beloved|strong="H0157"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* meaneth \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w divide|strong="H5157"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* substance \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H1069"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w beloved|strong="H0157"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* prefer \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w* \w portion|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w due|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w* birthrights.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stubborn|strong="H5637"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* unruly \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* commandments \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* corrected, slighteth \w obedience|strong="H8085"\w*:

\w They|strong="H8179"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* judgment,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stubborn|strong="H5637"\w*, \w he|strong="H0559"\w* slighteth \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* admonitions, \w he|strong="H0559"\w* giveth \w himself|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* revelling, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* debauchery \w and|strong="H1121"\w* banquetings:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* take \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H7130"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w committed|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* crime \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* punished \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* condemned \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* gibbet:

\w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w body|strong="H5038"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remain|strong="H3885"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w accursed|strong="H7045"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hangeth \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w*.
